data.text: Maryland municipalities show why municipal gov't works. Lets see your: 1) #CityHallSelfie 2) short videos celebrating your municipality and those who make it work 3) November town events -or- 4) Sneak peek of December events. Don't forget the #MGWMonth  1/

users.name: MD Municipal League
users.description: The association of Maryland's cities and towns. Reminder: A retweet, tweet or follow is not an endorsement.
